Dulwich Street Art Festival Tabs With Library World Econopedia List of Countries Title: Region: Income level capitalCity longitude latitude Pull the latest data from World bank For Offline Mode Synchronize data" World Bank Project Flag Capital: City Population Art of the week View Countries Econo-pedia Quiz test World Econo Pedia For Lovers of All Things Economics private String name=""; private String region=""; private String incomeLevel=""; private String capitalCity=""; private String longitude=""; private String latitude=""; About Us QuizActivity QuizActivityQuestions Dulwich Festival 9-18 May Gross Domestic Product (GDP) Exports & Imports of Goods (% of GDP) Overview Total Reserve GDP Per Capita Government Debt Check Answer Next Question Select Year to Display We are seven students currently studying Computer Science at King\'s College London, University of London. This app was our second group project as part of our studies in software engineering. About Us About Econopeia Econopedia is a data visualisation and comparison tool that connects directly to the World Bank country indicator database. It is build with simplicity and elegant design in mind, providing economic data in a beautiful way.
